title: Photographers capture dazzling color in Northeast China
text:
An aerial photo catches the striking autumn color palette of the treetops of a forest in Shulan city, Northeast China's Jilin province. [Photo by Xu Changyou/for chinadaily.com.cn]

Northeast China's Jilin province in late autumn is now providing its most stunning scenery to residents and tourists.

With cooling autumn temperatures, the whole province has turned into a colorful wonderland that attracts many photographers who want to capture its beauty, from red maple leaves to bright yellow rice.
description: Northeast China's Jilin province in late autumn is now providing its most stunning scenery to residents and tourists.
